text: Estola is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Estola. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: * Estola acrensis Galileo & Martins, 2009 * Estola acricula Bates, 1866 * Estola affinis Breuning, 1940 * Estola albicans Breuning, albostictica Breuning, 1940 * Estola albovaria Breuning, 1940 * Estola alternata Breuning, 1940 * Estola annulata (Fabricius, 1801) * Estola annulicornis Fisher, 1942 * Estola annulipes Breuning, 1940
